amendatorysection.catchline: Motorcycle safety instructor's or chief instructor's permit; term; renewal; fee.
amendatorysection.para: All permits issued under sections 60-2127 and 60-2129 shall be valid for three years and may be renewed upon application to the director as prescribed by the regulations of the department. If the applicant is an individual, the application for a permit shall include the applicant's social security number. Each application for a new or renewal motorcycle safety instructor's permit or chief instructor's permit shall be accompanied by a fee of five dollars. The fees collected under this section shall be placed in the state treasury and by the State Treasurer credited to the General Fund. No fee shall be refunded in the event that the permit is rejected, suspended, or revoked.
